title: Producer in Christchurch attacks movie quits amid backlash, Jacinda Ardern criticism
content:
1. Producer in Christchurch attacks movie quits amid backlash, Jacinda Ardern criticism  The Washington Post
  2. Christchurch attacks: producer resigns from film They Are Us as criticism grows  The Guardian
  3. Producer Pulls Out Of Christchurch Massacre Project Following Backlash, Jacinda Ardern Criticizes Movie  Deadline
  4. It is, quite simply, wrong to insist that the tragic events of 15 March 2019 belong to anything, or anyone, but History itself, Chris Trotter argues  Interest.co.nz
  5. Mosque attacks film: Movies about politicians should not be taxpayer-funded  Stuff.co.nz
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
